required_fields.title: first_name
required_fields.description: The first name of the user, often used to address them directly, e.g., 'Diana' or 'John'.

required_fields.title: last_name
required_fields.description: The last name of the user, used to address them more formally or as part of their full name.

required_fields.title: edu_level
required_fields.description: The education level of the user, represented by a number (1 for Primary School, 2 for Middle School, 3 for High School, 4 for Associate Degree, 5 for Bachelor's Degree, 6 for Master's Degree, 7 for PhD).

required_fields.title: current_role
required_fields.description: The current occupation or role of the user, indicating their professional or educational status, e.g., 'Data Scientist', 'Student'.

filter_fields.title: attributes
filter_fields.description: A list of attributes that we can extract from the user's profile. Must be a one of: first_name, last_name, age, edu_level, current_role, none

confirmation_fields.title: confirmed
confirmation_fields.description: True if the learner confirms that the profile information is correct.
